entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 2:37 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -21.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
